mdRecord.dcterms:title: Reprieve for Fratson; 01 of 01
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 1-134--Clippings ScrapbookPage 29; "Reprieve for Fratson. Bid to Be Made for His Release. Effort to Reopen Case."; A reprieve was sought for George Fratson, who was sentenced to death for murder of George Armstrong, an elderly shop owner. Thumbprint evidence was used, and claimed to be the case-winner.; Daily Dispatch; DF 654
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Evidence, Criminal
